resources.string: A special kind of martial arts lesson where the birthday VIP will be Sensei for the day! Fun, games, prizes and basic FUNdamentals such as discipline, respect, teamwork and a positive attitude! £20 room hire, then from £7 a head.
Private one-to-one and private group tuition is available on request and pre-arrangement. Private sessions can be designed around your needs. From £15 per hour.

Cougar Ki Martial Arts was founded in 2011 by Daniel Lancaster Sensei (4th Dan) who is currently the Chief Instructor. He is a recognised E.K.O National Coach with over 25 years experience in martial arts.
There are no email clients installed.
Karate lessons for Juniors, Seniors and Families; Filipino martial arts; Self Defence seminars, and much more.
